title: Cape Lookout National Seashore: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Moderate Rip Current Risk  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Moderate Rip Current Risk  Surf zone conditions are favorable for generating life threatening rip currents.  Rip currents can form at any beach with breaking waves but are are commonly formed at inlets and near jetties.  Learn how to escape from a rip current on our swimming page. more
